title: ITV Laura Woods releases statement on  weird  health scare after collapsing on live TV
body_text:
ITV Laura Woods releases statement on 'weird' health scare after collapsing on live TV
Laura Woods said she is OK after collapsing on live TV during ITV's coverage of England Women's international friendly against Ghana, sparking concern amongst viewers
TV presenter Laura Woods has reassured fans that she is "OK" after collapsing live on ITV during a football match, causing concern among viewers.
Woods was anchoring the coverage of the England women's team's international friendly against Ghana at St Mary's Stadium on ITV4, alongside Ian Wright and Anita Asante, when she suddenly fell forward, only to be caught by her co-presenters.
ITV swiftly cut to a commercial break and Woods was replaced by colleague Katie Shanahan, who informed viewers that the presenter had "taken ill".
PA news agency reported that Wood later posted on Instagram: "Gosh that was a bit weird. Sorry to worry everyone, I'm OK, the wonderful paramedics at Saints have said it's probably a virus, just need a bit of rest and hydration."
Woods expressed her embarrassment over the incident happening on live TV and thanked her colleagues for their assistance, reports the Manchester Evening News.
Her fiancee, 38 year old Adam Collard, confirmed in a post on X that Woods was "all OK" and expressed gratitude for the supportive messages received.
Woods regularly presents the coverage of football matches for ITV and TNT Sports. Supporters at home were quick to send their well-wishes after the scare, and expressed concern.
One X user said: "Really hope Laura Woods is okay. Fair play to Ian Wright and Anita Asante for catching her. Fair play to the stand-in presenter who stepped in, some effort that."
"Upsetting to see Laura Woods faint," said another, "Glad @IanWright0 caught her. Speedy recovery"
"Gosh, I hope Laura Woods is okay?" added a further fan. "Just watching #lionesses #engvgha Bravo Katie Shanahan who has stepped in at a moment's notice."
"I hope that Laura Woods is okay... Seeing her go down like that wasn't good.... My heart goes out to her," said a viewer.
